name: Old-school BSN CSS Mod for Stylish: max Background
description: This style builds on the Old-school BSN CSS Mod for Stylish but shows more of the background.
additional_info:
Release: 1.0: new branch from original Old-school BSN CSS Mod for Stylish
Credits: The CSS was originally created for greasemonkey by user dannyboy731, see also http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/398825 - all the credits and rights are his, I just adapted it for Stylish with some minor changes.
Background: just replace the link in background-image: url to your own background
